source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a dramatic scenery shot of a massive storm system. Dark, turbulent clouds loom over a vast, open grassland. Columns of heavy rain are visible falling in the distance.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video is a dramatic scenery shot of a massive storm system. Dark, turbulent clouds loom over a vast, open grassland. Columns of heavy rain are visible falling in the distance.

generated_critique: The caption fails to describe the primary motion in the video, which is a time-lapse of a storm system moving. It incorrectly portrays a static scene by stating clouds "loom" and rain is "visible falling." The caption should be revised to describe the movement of the storm, noting how the turbulent clouds churn and the entire system, along with its columns of rain, sweeps across the grassland. Additionally, the subjective adjective "dramatic" should be removed.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This time-lapse video shows a massive storm system sweeping across a vast, open grassland. Turbulent clouds churn as the entire system, along with its columns of heavy rain, moves across the landscape.
